content: rainbow caterpillar knitting pattern by amanda berry email fluffandfuzz@googlemail com website fluffandfuzz@weebly com notes introduction with only a few basic stitches you can knit this cute and colourful rainbow caterpillar work flat knit flat back and forth on a pair of single pointed knitting needles not in the round yarn casting on use the long tail cast on for this pattern unless otherwise instructed - the caterpillar is knitted in dk weight yarns double knitting 8 ply or light worsted weight in pull through to cast off cut the yarn leaving at a few grammes in each of seven yarn shades least a 30cm tail thread the tail onto a darning white pink orange yellow green pale blue needle and sew through the remaining sts on the and denim blue knitting needle pull the sts off the knitting needle onto the yarn gather together tightly and secure - the caterpillar photographed was knitted in deramores studio baby soft dk 100% acrylic seaming use mattress stitch for seams yarns in shades snow lollipop sunset stockinette stitch also known as stocking stitch sunshine kiwi mint and waves any similar dk purl the ws row and knit the rs row weight yarn is recommended one size 29cm long gauge 24 sts x 30 row for a 10cm x 10cm square needles & notions in stockinette stitch on 3mm needles don t worry - a pair of 3mm us 2½ single pointed knitting about gauge for this pattern it is not critical needles minimum length 20cm - a darning or tapestry needle for seaming - a few handfuls of toy filling copyright © 2020 amanda berry this free pattern is for personal use only not for resale -
